pgrid.util
Class Converter

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.util.Converter

public class Converter
extends Object

This class converts bytes to binary strings, to hexadecimal strings, and hexadecimal strings to bytes.

Version:
1.0 2003/04/15
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt

          Create a new Converter.

bytesToBinaryString

public static String bytesToBinaryString(byte[] data)
Returns a binary string represantation of an array of bytes.

Parameters:
data - the bytes to convert.
Returns:
a binary string represantation of the delivered bytes.

bytesToBinaryString

public static String bytesToBinaryString(byte[] data,
                                         int offset,
                                         int len)
Returns a binary string represantation of an array of bytes.

Parameters:
data - the bytes to convert.
offset - where to start to convert.
len - the number of bytes to convert.
Returns:
a binary string represantation of the delivered bytes.

bytesToHexString

public static String bytesToHexString(byte[] data,
                                      int offset,
                                      int len)
Returns a string represantation of an array of bytes. Each byte is representated as a hexadecimal char. The first byte is given by the offset, and the length by len.

Parameters:
data - the bytes to convert.
offset - where to start to convert.
len - the number of bytes to convert.
Returns:
a string represantation of the delivered bytes.

bytesToHexString

public static void bytesToHexString(byte[] data,
                                    int offset,
                                    int len,
                                    StringBuffer outbuf)
Converts an array of bytes to a string represantation with hexadecimal chars. The bytes are delivered with a certain offset, where to start, and the length, where to stop. The generated string is returned in the StringBuffer.

Parameters:
data - the bytes to convert.
offset - where to start to convert.
len - the number of bytes to convert.
outbuf - the string represantation of the delivered bytes.

hexStringToBytes

public static byte[] hexStringToBytes(String hexStr)
Converts a hexadecimal string in an array of bytes.

Parameters:
hexStr - the hex string to convert.
Returns:
the produced bytes.
